title: Back to the old client.
body:
Hi guys. I'm having some problems with the new client which is so slow and it literally don't work. I can't do nothing, like I can't start the game or open my profile. 
I wanna to pass to the old client but I saw that there isn't the option for that on the opening client screen, now can't I pass to the old client? Or there's another option? Please, the new client is so huge. 

Oh, don't say "buy a new pc", my pc is having some problems and I can't repair it so I wanted to play one game with an old pc.

replies.body:
Hello,

Sorry to hear you're having problems! What are the specifications of your machine? If it meets or exceeds our minimum requirements, then you shouldn't be encountering such glaring issues -- let us help you in that case. Others may be encountering the same issue, so if there's some sort of issue on our end, we definitely want to fix it. It is hard to get a sense for what could be going wrong unless you give us more details about your machine, however.

Thanks!
